```{r}

coronavirus <- readr::read_csv(here::here("content/post/data/coronavirus.csv"))
summary_df <- coronavirus %>% 
  filter(type == "confirmed") %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  summarise(total_cases = sum(cases)) %>%
  arrange(-total_cases)
head(summary_df)
```
